author: stsp
msg: tigris.org that was linked from here didn't pick up the new release
automatically, even though the release is available in the downloads
folder. I don't know how to make the release show up in tigris.org
directory listing. So link to subversion.tigris.org instead for now.
We're linking the 1.6.18 release archives from the download page on
